file_content.text: [This appears to be another recording by one of Master Rajivari's apprentices.]
Another Jedi today; my seventh. Master Rajivari formed an army from the allies he found past the mountains--we could sure use them now.
But they've vanished: just left their servants. Those cannibals in their stupid camps.
Master Rajivari's second principle says all life is a battle, even to your last breath. But our "allies" didn't leave us a choice.
